com.azure.identity.credential

Class DefaultAzureCredential

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.identity.credential.ChainedTokenCredential
      • com.azure.identity.credential.DefaultAzureCredential
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenCredential

    public final class DefaultAzureCredential
extends ChainedTokenCredential
    The base class for a token credential to be used in an Azure client library.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultAzureCredential()
      Creates default DefaultAzureCredential instance to use.
      DefaultAzureCredential(IdentityClientOptions identityClientOptions)
      Creates default DefaultAzureCredential instance to use.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class com.azure.identity.credential.ChainedTokenCredential

        addFirst, addLast, getToken

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultAzureCredential

        public DefaultAzureCredential()
        Creates default DefaultAzureCredential instance to use. This will use AZURE_CLIENT_ID, AZURE_CLIENT_SECRET, and AZURE_TENANT_ID environment variables to create a ClientSecretCredential.

      • DefaultAzureCredential

        public DefaultAzureCredential(IdentityClientOptions identityClientOptions)
        Creates default DefaultAzureCredential instance to use. This will use AZURE_CLIENT_ID, AZURE_CLIENT_SECRET, and AZURE_TENANT_ID environment variables to create a ClientSecretCredential.
        Parameters:
        identityClientOptions - the options to configure the IdentityClient
